Hello, I'm Šime Klapan, a 29-year-old aspiring frontend developer based in Zadar. A year ago, I embarked on a journey into frontend development, honing skills in JavaScript, CSS, HTML, React... Despite having majored in finance in Zagreb and finance background, I'm determined to transition into field of Information Technology.


In my self-study, I've been watching various YouTube and Udemy courses in the aforementioned languages to deepen my understanding and broaden my skill set. I'm trying to learn new languages and stay up-to-date with the latest developments in the industry.


Currently, I'm also enrolled in Algebra University's frontend course, where I'm expanding my knowledge under the guidance of experienced instructors. This structured learning environment allows me to deepen my understanding of frontend development principles and practices.


Furthermore, I'm gradually immersing myself in for me new technologies such as Tailwind CSS, TypeScript, and Node.js. While the learning curve may be steep, I embrace the challenge and am committed to mastering these tools.
